MemberSignature.Value: Public Function RegisterApp (sdp As BluetoothHidDeviceAppSdpSettings, inQos As BluetoothHidDeviceAppQosSettings, outQos As BluetoothHidDeviceAppQosSettings, executor As IExecutor, callback As BluetoothHidDevice.Callback) As Boolean

public: bool RegisterApp(Android::Bluetooth::BluetoothHidDeviceAppSdpSettings ^ sdp, Android::Bluetooth::BluetoothHidDeviceAppQosSettings ^ inQos, Android::Bluetooth::BluetoothHidDeviceAppQosSettings ^ outQos, Java::Util::Concurrent::IExecutor ^ executor, Android::Bluetooth::BluetoothHidDevice::Callback ^ callback);

public bool RegisterApp (Android.Bluetooth.BluetoothHidDeviceAppSdpSettings? sdp, Android.Bluetooth.BluetoothHidDeviceAppQosSettings? inQos, Android.Bluetooth.BluetoothHidDeviceAppQosSettings? outQos, Java.Util.Concurrent.IExecutor? executor, Android.Bluetooth.BluetoothHidDevice.Callback? callback);

.method public hidebysig instance bool RegisterApp(class Android.Bluetooth.BluetoothHidDeviceAppSdpSettings sdp, class Android.Bluetooth.BluetoothHidDeviceAppQosSettings inQos, class Android.Bluetooth.BluetoothHidDeviceAppQosSettings outQos, class Java.Util.Concurrent.IExecutor executor, class Android.Bluetooth.BluetoothHidDevice/Callback callback) cil managed

Docs.param: BluetoothHidDeviceAppSdpSettings object of HID Device SDP record. The HID Device SDP record is required.
BluetoothHidDeviceAppQosSettings object of Incoming QoS Settings. The Incoming QoS Settings is not required. Use null or default BluetoothHidDeviceAppQosSettings.Builder for default values.
BluetoothHidDeviceAppQosSettings object of Outgoing QoS Settings. The Outgoing QoS Settings is not required. Use null or default BluetoothHidDeviceAppQosSettings.Builder for default values.
Executor object on which callback will be executed. The Executor object is required.
Callback object to which callback messages will be sent. The Callback object is required.
Docs.summary: Registers application to be used for HID device.
Docs.returns: true if the command is successfully sent; otherwise false.

Docs.param: Report data, not including Report Id.
